Abstract - This paper describes an approach for computing a consensus translation from the outputs of multiple machine translation ( MT ) systems .The consensus translation is computed by weighted majority voting on a confusion network , similarly to the well - established ROVER approach of Fiscus for combining speech recognition hypotheses .
